K10bsu034_u:4503: yacco viviktaṃ sā saṃjñā yā viviktā sa deśanā /
K10bsu034_u:4504: saṃjñāsvabhāvo jñātaśca evaṃ saṃjñā na bheṣyati // SRS_32.93 //
K10bsu034_u:4505: prahāsyāma imāṃ saṃjñāṃ yasya saṃjñā pravartate /
K10bsu034_u:4506: saṃjñā prapañce carati na sa saṃjñātu mucyate // SRS_32.94 //
K10bsu034_u:4507: kasyeyaṃ saṃjñā utpannā kena saṃjñā utpāditā /
K10bsu034_u:4508: kena sā sparśitā saṃjñā kena saṃjñā nirodhitā // SRS_32.95 //
K10bsu034_u:4509: dharmo na labdho buddhena yasya saṃjñā utpadyate /
K10bsu034_u:4510: iha cintetha taṃ arthaṃ tataḥ saṃjñā na bheṣyati // SRS_32.96 //
K10bsu034_u:4511: kadā saṃjñā anutpannā kasya saṃjñā virudhyate /
K10bsu034_u:4512: vimokṣa ciatacārasya kathaṃ tatra utpadyate // SRS_32.97 //
K10bsu034_u:4513: yadā vimokṣaṃ spṛśati sarva cintā acintiyā /
K10bsu034_u:4514: acintiyā yadā cintā tadā bhoti acintiyaḥ // SRS_32.98 //
K10bsu034_u:4520: yathā sattvāstathā cintā yathā cintā tathā jināḥ /
K10bsu034_u:4521: acintiyena buddhena iyaṃ cintā prakāśitā // SRS_32.101 //
K10bsu034_u:4522: yo raho eku cinteti kadā cintā na bheṣyati /
K10bsu034_u:4523: na cintāṃ cintayantasya sarvacintā vigacchati // SRS_32.102 //
K10bsu034_u:4524: cyute mṛte kālagate yasya cintā pravartate /
K10bsu034_u:4531: na ca cintākṣayo jātaścintayitvā ayoniśaḥ // SRS_32.106 //
K10bsu034_u:4532: yo 'sau cintayate nāma kṣaye jñānaṃ na vidyate /
K10bsu034_u:4533: na kṣayo bhūmijñānasya kṣayasyo eṣa dharmatā // SRS_32.107 //
K10bsu034_u:4535: nirviśeṣāśca te dharmā yathā jñānaṃ tathā kṣayaḥ // SRS_32.108 //
K10bsu034_u:4537: kalpakoṭiṃ pi bhāṣitvā animittena deśitāḥ // SRS_32.109 //
K10bsu034_u:4539: na cānyo darśito bhāvo nābhāvo 'nyo nidarśitaḥ // SRS_32.110 //
K10bsu034_u:4541: na cāsau sarvabuddhehi abhāvaḥ śakyu paśyitum // SRS_32.111 //
K10bsu034_u:4543: evaṃ bhāvān vijānitvā abhāvo bhoti darśitaḥ // SRS_32.112 //
K10bsu034_u:4545: sparśanāttu abhāvasya nirvṛti eṣa deśitā // SRS_32.113 //
K10bsu034_u:4546: ahaṃ buddho bhavelloke yasyaiṣā ho matirbhavet /
K10bsu034_u:4547: na jātu bhavatṛṣṇārto bodhiṃ budhyeta paṇḍitaḥ // SRS_32.114 //
K10bsu034_u:4548: na kaṃci dharmaṃ prārtheti bodhisattvaḥ samāhitaḥ /
K10bsu034_u:4549: niṣkiṃcanā nirābhogā eṣā bodhīti ucyate // SRS_32.115 //
K10bsu034_u:4551: bahū evaṃ pravakṣyanti vayaṃ bodhāya prasthitāḥ /
K10bsu034_u:4552: imāṃ gatimajānanto dūre te buddhabodhaye // SRS_32.116 //
K10bsu034_u:4553: śabdena deśitā dharmāḥ sarve saṃskāra śūnyakāḥ /
K10bsu034_u:4554: yaśva svabhāvaḥ śabdasya gambhīraḥ sūkṣma durdṛśaḥ // SRS_32.117 //
K10bsu034_u:4562: vipāka eṣa śūrāṇāṃ nityakālaṃ samāhitaḥ // SRS_32.121 //
K10bsu034_u:4564: paśyanti lokapradyotān yathā gaṅgāya vālikā // SRS_32.122 //
K10bsu034_u:4566: cittasya vaśitāṃ prāptāḥ kāyasteṣāṃ prabhāsvaraḥ // SRS_32.123 //
K10bsu034_u:4568: tebhiḥ saṃskāraṛddhīye kalāṃ nāyānti ṣoḍaśīm // SRS_32.124 //
K10bsu034_u:4570: anyatra lokanāthebhyo ye vā teṣāṃ same sthitāḥ // SRS_32.125 //
K10bsu034_u:4571: na teṣāmasti khālityaṃ na caiva palitaṃ śire /
K10bsu034_u:4572: audārikā jarā nāsti na duḥkhamaraṇaṃ tathā // SRS_32.126 //
K10bsu034_u:4573: saṃśayo vimatirnāsti kāṅkṣā teṣāṃ na vidyate /
K10bsu034_u:4576: samacittāḥ sadā bhonti sarvasattvāna te 'ntike // SRS_32.128 //
K10bsu034_u:4586: sulabdhaṃ tena mānuṣyaṃ prahīṇāḥ sarvi akṣaṇāḥ /
K10bsu034_u:4587: kṛtajñāḥ sarvabuddhānāṃ yeṣāṃ sūtramidaṃ priyam // SRS_32.133 //
K10bsu034_u:4589: yairitaḥ sūtraśreṣṭhāto dhṛtā gāthā catuṣpadā // SRS_32.134 //
K10bsu034_u:4591: kṣipraṃ ca bodhiṃ prāpsyanti teṣāṃ sūtramidaṃ priyam // SRS_32.135 //
K10bsu034_u:4592: na teṣāṃ kāṅkṣa vimatī sarvadharmeṣu bheṣyatī /
K10bsu034_u:4593: āsannā nirvṛtisteṣāṃ yeṣāṃ sūtramidaṃ priyam // SRS_32.136 //
K10bsu034_u:4595: sarve vyākṛtu buddhena drakṣyanti maitrakaṃ jinam // SRS_32.137 //
K10bsu034_u:4596: dṛṣṭvā maitreya saṃbuddhaṃ lapsyante kṣānti bhadrikām /
K10bsu034_u:4597: ye keci kṣayakālasminniha sūtre pratiṣṭhitāḥ // SRS_32.138 //
K10bsu034_u:4599: acintiyāyāṃ koṭīye kāṅkṣā teṣāṃ na vidyate // SRS_32.139 //
K10bsu034_u:4600: na teṣāṃ vidyate kāṅkṣā aṇūmātrāpi sarvaśaḥ /
K10bsu034_u:4601: aṇūmātre prahīṇesmin bodhisteṣāṃ na durlabhā // SRS_32.140 //
K10bsu034_u:4604: idaṃ sūtraṃ priyaṃ kṛtvā buddhānāṃ gañjarakṣakāḥ /
K10bsu034_u:4609: teṣāṃ kāyagatā ete kṣayakāle pravartiṣu // SRS_32.144 //
K10bsu034_u:4610: te te nādaṃ nadiṣyanti buddhānāṃ kṣetrakoṭiṣu /
K10bsu034_u:4611: saṃmukhaṃ lokanāthānāṃ śākyasiṃhasya yā carī // SRS_32.145 //
K10bsu034_u:4616: ye rakṣiṣyantimāṃ bodhiṃ kṣayakāle mahābhaye // SRS_32.147 //
K10bsu034_u:4617: te te rūpeṇa saṃpannā lakṣaṇehi vicitritāḥ /
K10bsu034_u:4624: niścarī romakūpebhyo yathā gaṅgāya vālikāḥ // SRS_32.151 //
K10bsu034_u:4625: ye ca śṛṇvanti taṃ śabdaṃ sattvakoṭyo acintiyāḥ /
K10bsu034_u:4628: acintiyeṣu kṣetreṣu teṣāṃ śabdaḥ śruṇīyati // SRS_32.153 //
K10bsu034_u:4629: ye ca śṛṇvanti taṃ śabdaṃ teṣāṃ saṃjñā nirudhyate /
K10bsu034_u:4633: guṇānuśaṃsā ityete yā labhante ha paṇḍitāḥ /
K10bsu034_u:4634: anye aparimāṇāśca yairiyaṃ bodhi dhāritā // SRS_32.156 //
K10bsu034_u:4636: vivartayitvā strībhāvaṃ sa bhaved dharmabhāṇakaḥ // SRS_32.157 //
K10bsu034_u:4637: na sā puno 'pi strībhāvamitaḥ paścād grahīṣyati /
K10bsu034_u:4638: bhavet prāsādiko nityaṃ lakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtaḥ // SRS_32.158 //
K10bsu034_u:4639: śreṣṭhe 'tha iha sūtrasmin guṇāḥ śreṣṭhāḥ prakāśitāḥ /
K10bsu034_u:4640: te 'sya sarve bhaviṣyanti kṣipraṃ bodhiṃ ca prāpsyate // SRS_32.159 //
K10bsu034_u:4641: viśāradaśca so nityaṃ bhoti sarvāsu jātiṣu /
K10bsu034_u:4642: dhārayitvā idaṃ sūtraṃ bodhisattvāna gocaram // SRS_32.160 //
K10bsu034_u:4644: ya icched buddhituṃ bodhimidaṃ sūtraṃ pravartayet // SRS_32.161 //
K10bsu034_u:4647: lapsyanti nacireṇemāṃ bhūmiṃ śāntāṃ samāhitāḥ // SRS_32.162 //
K10bsu034_u:4648: iha bodhīya te śūrā bodhisattvāḥ sthitāḥ sadā /
K10bsu034_u:4649: paśyanti buddhakoṭīyo yathā gaṅgāya vālikāḥ // SRS_32.163 //
K10bsu034_u:4653: sa labhitva śāntaṃ imu virajaṃ samādhim // SRS_32.164 //
K10bsu034_u:4662: śūnyānimittaṃ paramapraṇītu śāntaṃ dharma praśāntaṃ cara nipuṇaṃ asaṅgam /
K10bsu034_u:4663: svabhāvaśūnyaṃ sada virajaṃ praśāntaṃ samādhiprāptyā bahu jani saṃprakāśayī // SRS_32.167 //
K10bsu034_u:4665: gambhīra śāntaṃ labhiya imaṃ samādhimālokaprāpto bhaviṣyati sarvalokaḥ // SRS_32.168 //
K10bsu034_u:4666: śuciśca nityaṃ bhaviṣyati brahmacārī sa nirāmagandhaḥ satatamasaṃkiliṣṭaḥ /
K10bsu034_u:4667: anyāṃśca tatra sthapiṣyati sattvakoṭayo labdhvā praśāntaṃ imu virajaṃ samādhim // SRS_32.169 //
K10bsu034_u:4668: sa sutīkṣṇaprajño bhaviṣyati śreṣṭhaprajñaḥ śrutisāgaro 'sau nityamanantabuddhiḥ /
K10bsu034_u:4669: kalyāṇavākyo matikuśalo vidhijño dhāritva śāntiṃ imu virajaṃ samādhim // SRS_32.170 //
K10bsu034_u:4671: ye karmasthānā tathariva śilpasthānā bhaiṣajyasthānāstathariva auṣadhīnām /
K10bsu034_u:4672: sarvatra dhīro bhaviṣyati pāraprāpto dhāritva sūtraṃ imu virajaṃ samādhim // SRS_32.171 //
K10bsu034_u:4673: kāvyeṣu śāstreṣu tathapi ca hāsyalāsye nṛtye 'tha gīte sukuśala pāraprāptaḥ /
K10bsu034_u:4674: ācāryu loke bhaviṣyati nityakālaṃ dhāritva śāntaṃ imu virajaṃ samādhim // SRS_32.172 //
K10bsu034_u:4675: parivāravān so bhaviṣyati nityakālaṃ sa abhedyapakṣaḥ sada sahitaḥ samagraḥ /
K10bsu034_u:4676: caramāṇu śreṣṭhāṃ varāṃ śiva bodhicaryāṃ dhāritva sūtraṃ imu virajaṃ samādhim // SRS_32.173 //
K10bsu034_u:4677: śokātha śalyā tathariva cittapīḍā no tasya jātu bhaviṣyati paṇḍitasya /
K10bsu034_u:4678: ārogyaprāpto bhaviṣyati sarvakālaṃ dhāritva śāntaṃ imu virajaṃ samādhim // SRS_32.174 //
K10bsu034_u:4679: ye kāyaśūlāstathariva cittaśūlāḥ ye dantaśūlāstathapi ca śīrṣaśūlāḥ /
K10bsu034_u:4680: no tasya bhontī vyādhayu jīvaloke dhāritva śāntaṃ imu virajaṃ samādhim // SRS_32.175 //
K10bsu034_u:4681: yāvanta rogā bahuvidha martaloke ye kāyarogāstathariva cittarogāḥ /
K10bsu034_u:4682: te tasya rogāḥ satata na jātu bhonti dhāritva śāntaṃ imu virajaṃ samādhim // SRS_32.176 //
K10bsu034_u:4683: cittasya vā ye bahuvidhu yatkileśāḥ kāye vāpi bahuvidha rogajātāḥ /
K10bsu034_u:4684: te tasya nāstī bahuvidha saṃkileśā dhāritva śāntaṃ imu viraja samādhim // SRS_32.177 //
K10bsu034_u:4685: yathantarīkṣaṃ gaganamanopaliptaṃ prakṛtiviśuddhaṃ vimala prabhāsvaraṃ ca /
K10bsu034_u:4687: cittaṃ tathaiva bhavati viśuddha tasyo dhāritva śāntaṃ imu virajaṃ samādhim // SRS_32.178 //
K10bsu034_u:4688: candrasya ābhā tathariva sūryaābhā śuddhā agrāhyā bhavati prabhāsvarāśca /
K10bsu034_u:4689: cittaṃ tathaiva bhavati prabhāsvaraṃ ca dhāritva śāntaṃ imu virajaṃ samādhim // SRS_32.179 //
K10bsu034_u:4690: yatha antarīkṣaṃ na sukaru citraṇāya raṅgān gṛhītvā bahuvidha naikarūpān /
K10bsu034_u:4691: cittaṃ tathaiva na sukaru citrituṃ sevetva śāntaṃ imu virajaṃ samādhim // SRS_32.180 //
K10bsu034_u:4692: vāto yathaiva caturdiśa vāyamāno asajjamāno vrajati diśaḥ samantāt /
K10bsu034_u:4693: vātasamānā bhavati sa cittadhārā jagi so asakto vrajati anopaliptaḥ // SRS_32.181 //
K10bsu034_u:4694: jālena śakyaṃ gṛhṇitu vāyamānaḥ pāśena cāpī bandhitu śakya vātaḥ /
K10bsu034_u:4695: no tasya cittaṃ sukaru vijānanāya bhāvetva śāntamimu virajaṃ samādhim // SRS_32.182 //
K10bsu034_u:4696: pratibhāsu śakyaṃ jalagata gṛhṇanāya saṃprāptu toyaṃ tathapi ca tailapātre /
K10bsu034_u:4697: no tasya cittaṃ sukaru vijānanāya bhāvetva śāntaṃ imu virajaṃ samādhim // SRS_32.183 //
K10bsu034_u:4698: garjanti meghā vidyulatā carantā śakyaṃ grahītu pāṇina mānuṣeṇa /
K10bsu034_u:4699: no tasya cittaṃ sukaru pramāṇu jñātuṃ bhāvetva śāntaṃ imu virajaṃ samādhim // SRS_32.184 //
K10bsu034_u:4700: sattvāna śakyaṃ rūtaravitaṃ grahītuṃ ye santi sattvā daśadiśi buddhakṣetra /
K10bsu034_u:4701: cittasya tasyo na sukaru jñātu koṭiṃ samādhilabdho yada bhavi bodhisattvaḥ // SRS_32.185 //
K10bsu034_u:4703: so tāṃ labhitva virajaṃ samādhibhūmiṃ asaṃṃkiliṣṭo bhavati anopaliptaḥ /
K10bsu034_u:4704: no tasya bhūyo tribhavi niveśa jātu anena labdho bhavati samādhi śāntaḥ // SRS_32.196 //
K10bsu034_u:4705: no kāmalolo na ca puna rūpalolo na istrilolo na ca puna bhrāntacittaḥ /
K10bsu034_u:4706: śāntaḥ praśānto bhavati anopalipto yada bhoti labdho ayu virajaḥ samādhiḥ // SRS_32.187 //
K10bsu034_u:4707: na putralolo na ca puna dhītalolo no bhāryalolo na ca parivāralolaḥ /
K10bsu034_u:4708: suśāntacārī bhavati anopalipto yada bhoti labdho ayu virajaḥ samādhiḥ // SRS_32.188 //
K10bsu034_u:4709: na hiraṇyalolo na ca punararthalolo na svargalolo dhanarataneṣvasaktaḥ /
K10bsu034_u:4710: suviśuddhacitto bhavati sa nirvikalpaḥ samādhiprāpto ayu bhavatī viśeṣaḥ // SRS_32.189 //
K10bsu034_u:4711: na svargahetoścarati sa brahmacaryaṃ na svargalolo dadati sadā nu vijñaḥ /
K10bsu034_u:4714: no rājyahetoścarati tapo vrataṃ vā naiśvaryamarthāstribhuvani prārthamānaḥ /
K10bsu034_u:4715: saṃbodhilolo bahujanahitāya niṣpādayī so imu virajaṃ samādhim // SRS_32.191 //
K10bsu034_u:4716: no tasya rāgo janayati jātu pīḍāṃ yo na strīlolo so bhavati bhrāntacittaḥ /
K10bsu034_u:4717: tathāpi tena prakṛtiprajñāya rāgo labhitva etaṃ viraju samādhi śāntam // SRS_32.192 //
K10bsu034_u:4718: no tasya doṣo janayati jātu pīḍāṃ vyāpādu yeno pratighamatho kareyya /
K10bsu034_u:4720: maitrāya teno nihata sa doṣadhātu pratilabhya etaṃ viraju samādhi śāntam // SRS_32.193 //
K10bsu034_u:4721: no tasya moho janayati jātu pīḍāṃ prajñāya teno nihata sa moha avidyā /
K10bsu034_u:4722: taṃ jñānu labdhaṃ vitimiramaprameyaṃ samādhiprāpte imi guṇa aprameyāḥ // SRS_32.194 //
K10bsu034_u:4723: aśubhāya rāgaḥ satata sunigṛhīto maitryāya doṣo nihatu sadā aśeṣaḥ /
K10bsu034_u:4724: prajñāya moho vidhamiya kleśajālaṃ samādhiprāptaḥ pratapati sarvaloke // SRS_32.195 //
K10bsu034_u:4725: no tasya middhaṃ janayati jātu pīḍāṃ subhāvitā se vividha utkileśāḥ /
K10bsu034_u:4726: anopalipto bhavati ca vipramuktaḥ samādhiprāpte imi guṇa aprameyāḥ // SRS_32.196 //
K10bsu034_u:4727: no tasya moho janayati jātu pīḍāṃ tathā hi tyāge abhiratu nityakālam /
K10bsu034_u:4728: sarvasvatyāgī bhavati sukhasya dātā ya imaṃ samādhiṃ dhārayati bodhisattvaḥ // SRS_32.197 //
K10bsu034_u:4729: sthāmenupeto bhavati anopameyo sa balenupeto bhavati nityakālam /
K10bsu034_u:4730: no tasya loke bhavati samaḥ kadācid ya imaṃ samādhiṃ dhārayati bodhisattvaḥ // SRS_32.198 //
K10bsu034_u:4731: yadāpi rājā sa bhavati cakravartīṃ manujānu loke upagata jambudvīpe /
K10bsu034_u:4732: tadāpi bhotī bahujanapūjanīyo viśeṣaprāpto matima viśiṣṭaprajñaḥ // SRS_32.199 //
K10bsu034_u:4733: ye bhonti mukhyāḥ kularatanā viśiṣṭāḥ suprabhūtabhogā bahujanasvāpateyāḥ /
K10bsu034_u:4734: yatrāśva hastī rathavara yugyayānā hiraṇyasvarṇaṃ maṇīratanaṃ prabhūtam // SRS_32.200 //
K10bsu034_u:4736: ye śrāddha bhontī iha varabuddhajñāne te jambudvīpe kularatanābhiyuktāḥ /
K10bsu034_u:4737: tatropapannaḥ kularatane viśiṣṭe karoti so 'rthaṃ suvipula jñātisaṃghe // SRS_32.201 //
K10bsu034_u:4738: aśrāddha ye vā iha kula jambudvipe śraddhāṃ sa teṣāṃ janayati apramattaḥ /
K10bsu034_u:4739: yaṃ bodhicitte pratiṣṭhiti sattvakāye te buddha bhontī jinapravaraḥ svayaṃbhūḥ // SRS_32.202 //
K10bsu034_u:4740: te ca spṛśitva atuliyamagrabodhiṃ cakraṃ pravartentyasadṛśa buddhakṣetre /
K10bsu034_u:4741: ye co vijānī imu tada dharmacakraṃ anutpattidharme nikhila te saṃpratiṣṭhī // SRS_32.203 //
K10bsu034_u:4742: subahukarāśco ami tada bodhisattvāḥ sattvāna bhonti satatu te pūjanīyāḥ /
K10bsu034_u:4743: karonti te 'rthaṃ atuliya nityakālaṃ sattvāna cakṣurvitimiru te janenti // SRS_32.204 //
K10bsu034_u:4744: bahava śatasahasrāḥ sattvakoṭī anantā yeṣa kuśalamūlā bhonti tatra śruṇitvā /
K10bsu034_u:4745: te api pratilabhante uttamaṃ bodhicittaṃ yada jinu anuśāsī bodhisattvaṃ mahātmā // SRS_32.205 //
K10bsu034_u:4746: aśūnyakṣetrā pramudita bhonti nityaṃ nirupalepā ami tada buddha bhontī /
K10bsu034_u:4747: yatra sthihantī imi tada bodhisattvāḥ sattvānamartha aparimitaṃ karonti // SRS_32.206 //
K10bsu034_u:4748: rakṣanti śīlaṃ asadṛśu brahmacaryaṃ bhāvī samādhī vipulamanantakalpān /

K10bsu034_u:6084: so pariṣāya prabhāṣati dharmaṃ śūnya nirātma nirjīvimi dharmāḥ /
K10bsu034_u:6085: ye upalambhika ātmaniviṣṭāsteṣa na rocati yaṃ bhaṇi bhikṣuḥ // SRS_37.54 //
K10bsu034_u:6086: utthitu bhikṣava śastra gṛhītvā yeṣa na rocati śūnyata śāntā /
K10bsu034_u:6087: eṣa adharma prabhāṣati bhikṣuḥ etu hanitva bhaviṣyati puṇyam // SRS_37.55 //
K10bsu034_u:6088: dṛṣṭva ca śastra na bhāyati bhikṣuḥ śūnyaka dharmamanusmaramāṇaḥ /
K10bsu034_u:6089: nāstiha sattva naro vāpahatyai kuḍyasamā imi riktaka dharmāḥ // SRS_37.56 //
K10bsu034_u:6090: bhikṣu karoti sa añjali mūrdhnā bhāṣati vāca namo 'stu jinānām /
K10bsu034_u:6091: yena satyenimi śūnyaka dharmā bhontimi śastra māndāravapuṣpāḥ // SRS_37.57 //
K10bsu034_u:6093: kampita medini savanaṣaṇḍā śastra te jāta māndāravapuṣpāḥ // SRS_37.58 //
K10bsu034_u:6095: bhikṣu abhūttada maṃkuśarīrā ye upalambhika śastragṛhītāḥ /
K10bsu034_u:6096: bhūyu ya śakyupasaṃkramaṇāye trasya abhūt sumahādbhutajātāḥ // SRS_37.59 //
K10bsu034_u:6097: ye puna śrāddha prasanna munīndre yeṣiha rocati śunyata śāntā /
K10bsu034_u:6098: tehi huṃkārasahasra karitvā dūṣyaśatairabhichādita bhikṣuḥ // SRS_37.60 //
K10bsu034_u:6099: bhikṣu janitvana maitra sa teṣu sarvajanasya purasta bhaṇāti /
K10bsu034_u:6100: ye mayi sattva pradoṣa karontī teṣa kṛte na hu bodhi carāmi // SRS_37.61 //
K10bsu034_u:6101: tena ca varṣa aśītiranūnā bhāṣita śūnyata koṣu jinānām /
K10bsu034_u:6102: bhikṣusahasra pratyarthika āsan ye ca nivārita rājasutena // SRS_37.62 //
K10bsu034_u:6103: so 'pi tadā paribhūt abhūṣī tasya ca bhikṣu parīttaku āsan /
K10bsu034_u:6104: vācamaniṣṭa tadā śruṇamānaḥ kṣāntibalā cyuta no ca kadācit // SRS_37.63 //
K10bsu034_u:6105: so 'pareṇa ca punaḥ samayena prāṇiśatāna karī mahadartham /
K10bsu034_u:6106: śīlamakhilamanusmaramāṇaḥ puṇyamatisya tadā bhaṇi vācam // SRS_37.64 //
K10bsu034_u:6107: tatra sa gauravu kṛtva udāraṃ puṇyamatī avacī tada bhikṣum /
K10bsu034_u:6108: mā mama kinacidācariyasyo cetasi kiṃci kṛtaṃ amanāpam // SRS_37.65 //
K10bsu034_u:6109: so avacī śṛṇu rājakumārā kṣāntibalena samudgata buddhāḥ /
K10bsu034_u:6111: yena mi bhāṣita vācamaniṣṭāstasyimi antiki maitra udārā // SRS_37.66 //
K10bsu034_u:6112: yena sa kalpasahasraśatāni kṣānti niṣevita pūrvabhaveṣu /
K10bsu034_u:6113: so ahu bhikṣu yaśaḥprabhu āsaṃ śākyamunirbhagavān bhaṇi vācam // SRS_37.67 //
K10bsu034_u:6114: yena yaśaḥprabhu rakṣitu bhikṣuḥ puṇyamatī tada rājinu putraḥ /
K10bsu034_u:6115: jātisahasra mamāsi sahāyaḥ so maya vyākṛtu maitraku buddhaḥ // SRS_37.68 //
K10bsu034_u:6116: yena gaṇeśvara pūjitu śāstā yena tu kārita śreṣṭha vihārāḥ /
K10bsu034_u:6117: pūrvamasau varapuṣpasunāmā so padumotturu āsi munīndraḥ // SRS_37.69 //
K10bsu034_u:6118: eva mayā bahukalpa anantā dhārayitāmimu dharma jinānām /
K10bsu034_u:6119: kṣāntibalaṃ samudānita pūrve śratva kumāra mamā anuśikṣāḥ // SRS_37.70 //
K10bsu034_u:6120: nirvṛtimapyatha bheṣyati evaṃ paścimi kāli saddharmavilope /
K10bsu034_u:6121: bhikṣu va tīrthamateṣvabhiyuktā te mama dharma pratikṣipi śāntam // SRS_37.71 //
K10bsu034_u:6122: unnata uddhata duṣṭa pragalbhā pāpasahāyaka bhojanalubdhāḥ /
K10bsu034_u:6123: cīvarapātraratāḥ paṭalubdhāḥ lābhasaṃniśrita te kṣipi dharmam // SRS_37.72 //
K10bsu034_u:6125: pravrajitā iha śāsani mahyaṃ te 'pi pratikṣipi śāntamu dharmam // SRS_37.73 //
K10bsu034_u:6128: mohavaśena tu mohita bālā yeṣa na rocati śūnyata śāntā // SRS_37.74 //
K10bsu034_u:6129: bhikṣu ca bhikṣuṇikā gṛhiṇaśco grāhita mohita pāpamatībhiḥ /
K10bsu034_u:6130: teṣa vaśānugatā sada bhūtvā paścimi kāli pratikṣipi bodhim // SRS_37.75 //
K10bsu034_u:6131: śrutva kumāra imā mama vācaṃ bhikṣu araṇyakule vasi nityam /
K10bsu034_u:6132: yeṣiya rocati śūnyata śāntā tairayu dhāritu dharmu jinānām // SRS_37.76 //
K10bsu034_u:6133: pravraji te mama śāsani caritva bhikṣu upasaṃpadapoṣadhakarmam /
K10bsu034_u:6134: bhuñjimu piṇḍamasaktā aduṣṭā ye imu dhārayiṣyanti samādhim // SRS_37.77 //
K10bsu034_u:6135: jīvita kāya apekṣi prahāyā śūnyata bhāvayathā supraśāntām /
K10bsu034_u:6136: yuktaprayuktamanā ca bhavitvā seva araṇya sadā mṛgabhūtāḥ // SRS_37.78 //
K10bsu034_u:6137: nitya karotha ca pūja jinānāṃ chatradhvajarddhiyamālyavihāraiḥ /
K10bsu034_u:6138: cetiya pūjayathā pratimānāṃ kṣipra labhiṣyatha etu samādhim // SRS_37.79 //
K10bsu034_u:6140: pratima suniṣṭhita ratnavicitrā bodhinidhānu janitvana cittam // SRS_37.80 //
K10bsu034_u:6141: yāvati pūja jagesmi praṇītā divyatha mānuṣikā ramaṇīyā /
K10bsu034_u:6143: sarva gaveṣiya buddha mahethā bodhinidhānu karitva pratijñām // SRS_37.81 //
K10bsu034_u:6144: dharmata paśyatha sarvi narendrān yāvata santi daśa diśi loke /
K10bsu034_u:6145: dṛśyati nirvṛti sarvajinānāṃ dharmatayā sthita saṃmukha buddhāḥ // SRS_37.82 //
K10bsu034_u:6146: bhotha ca sarviṣu tyāgādhimuktāḥ śīlaviśuddhagatā sthiracittāḥ /
K10bsu034_u:6147: kṣāntiratāḥ sada maitraratāśco sarvi prajānatha śūnyaka dharmān // SRS_37.83 //
K10bsu034_u:6148: vīryu janetha alīna adīnāḥ dhyānaratāḥ pravivekaratāśca /
K10bsu034_u:6149: prajña prajānatha prajñaviśuddhiṃ bheṣyatha kāruṇikā nacireṇa // SRS_37.84 //
K10bsu034_u:6150: rāgu śametha sadā aśubhā ye doṣu nigṛhṇatha kṣāntibalena /
K10bsu034_u:6151: mohu nigṛhṇatha prajñabalenā prāpsyatha bodhi jinānu praśastām // SRS_37.85 //
K10bsu034_u:6152: kāyu vibhāvayathā yathā phenaṃ duḥkhamasāraku pūtidurgandham /
K10bsu034_u:6153: skandha prajānatha riktaka sarvāṃllapsyatha jñānamanuttaru kṣipram // SRS_37.86 //
K10bsu034_u:6154: dṛṣṭi ma gṛhṇatha pāpika jātu ātma ayaṃ puruṣo atha jīvaḥ /
K10bsu034_u:6155: sarvi prajānatha śūnyaka dharmān kṣipra spṛśiṣyatha uttamabodhim // SRS_37.87 //
K10bsu034_u:6156: lābha ma kurvatha gṛddho kadācit mā paritapyatha piṇḍalamabdhvā /
K10bsu034_u:6157: nindita śaṃsita mā khu calethā merusamāśca akampiya bhothā // SRS_37.88 //
K10bsu034_u:6159: dharma gaveṣatha gauravajātāḥ śratva tadāpi ca tatpara bhotha /
K10bsu034_u:6160: tiṣṭhata gocari sarvajinānāṃ yāsyatha kṣipra sukhāvatikṣetram // SRS_37.89 //
K10bsu034_u:6161: sarvajage samacitta bhavitvā apriya mā priya citta karotha /
K10bsu034_u:6162: mā na gaveṣatha lābhu yaśo vā kṣipra bhaviṣyatha buddha munīndrāḥ // SRS_37.90 //
K10bsu034_u:6164: yān guṇa śrutviha sattva prasannāḥ buddhaguṇeṣu spṛhāṃ janayeyuḥ // SRS_37.91 //
K10bsu034_u:6165: nitya sagaurava cācariyeṣu mātu pitustatha sarvajagasmin /
K10bsu034_u:6166: mā puna mānavaśānuga bhothā lapsyatha lakṣaṇa triṃśa duve ca // SRS_37.92 //
K10bsu034_u:6167: saṃgaṇikāṃ vijahitva aśeṣāṃ nityu vivekaratāpi ca bhotha /
K10bsu034_u:6168: sūrata nityupaśobhana śāntā ātmahitāḥ parasattvahitāśca // SRS_37.93 //
K10bsu034_u:6169: maitri niṣevi tathā karuṇāṃ co muditapekṣaratāḥ sada bhotha /
K10bsu034_u:6170: śāstuḥ praśāsanu paśyatha nityaṃ bheṣyatha kṣipra hitaṃkaru loke // SRS_37.94 //
K10bsu034_u:6171: pāpaka mitra ma jātu bhajetha sevatha mitra ye bhonti udārāḥ /
K10bsu034_u:6172: yeṣiha rocati śūnyata śāntā ye abhiprasthitā uttamabodhim // SRS_37.95 //
K10bsu034_u:6173: śrāvakabhūmi ma śikṣatha jātu mā ca spṛheṣyatha tatra carīye /
K10bsu034_u:6175: cittu ma riñcatha buddhaguṇeṣu kṣipra bhaviṣyatha buddha jinendrāḥ // SRS_37.96 //
K10bsu034_u:6176: satya giraṃ sada bhāṣatha śuddhāṃ mā mṛṣa bhāṣatha mā paruṣāṃ ca /
K10bsu034_u:6177: nitya priyaṃ madhuraṃ ca bhaṇethā lapsyatha vāca lokācariyāṇām // SRS_37.97 //
K10bsu034_u:6178: kāyi anarthika jīvita bhothā mātma utkarṣaka mā parapaṃsī /
K10bsu034_u:6179: ātmaguṇān samudānayamānāḥ paracariyāsu upekṣaka bhotha // SRS_37.98 //
K10bsu034_u:6180: śūnyavimokṣaratāḥ sada bhothā mā praṇidhāna karotha gatīṣu /
K10bsu034_u:6181: sarvanimitta vivarjya aśeṣāṃ bhotha sadā animittavihārī // SRS_37.99 //
K10bsu034_u:6182: anta vivarjayathā sadakālaṃ śāśvatucchedasthitā ma bhavātha /
K10bsu034_u:6183: pratyayatā sada budhyata sarvaṃ eva bhaviṣyatha yādṛśa śāstā // SRS_37.100 //
K10bsu034_u:6184: kāmaratīṣu ratiṃ vijahitvā doṣakhilāṃśca malān vijahitvā /
K10bsu034_u:6185: mohatamo vijahitvase sarvaṃ śāntaratā narasiṃha bhavātha // SRS_37.101 //
K10bsu034_u:6186: nityamanitya ca paśyatha nityaṃ sarvabhavā sukhaduḥkha vimucya /
K10bsu034_u:6187: aśubhamanātmata ātmaśubheṣu bhāvayamānu bhaveya naredraḥ // SRS_37.102 //
K10bsu034_u:6191: yāttaka bhāṣita eti guṇā me ye ca prakāśita doṣaśatā me /
K10bsu034_u:6192: doṣa vivarjiya śikṣa guṇeṣu bheṣyasi buddhu tadeha kumāra // SRS_37.104 //
K10bsu034_u:6196: tasmāttarhi kumāra kāyasaṃvarasaṃvṛto bhaviṣyāmītyevaṃ tvayā kumāra śikṣitavyam /
K10bsu034_u:6198: yena kāyasaṃvareṇa samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmeṣvasaṅgajñānaṃ pratilabhate,
K10bsu034_u:6200: yena kāyasaṃvareṇa samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni pratilabhate,
K10bsu034_u:6202: yena - - - - - - mahāsattvo daśa tathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni aṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān pratilabhate,
K10bsu034_u:6211: yaduta maitrīṃ karuṇāṃ muditāmupekṣāṃ imāṃścaturo brāhmān vihārān,
K10bsu034_u:6234: punaraparaṃ kumāra yena kāyasaṃvareṇa samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prāṇātipātāt prativirato bhavati /
K10bsu034_u:6235: adattādānāt abrahmacaryānmṛṣāvādāt piśunavacanāt paruṣavacanāt saṃbhinnapralāpāt abhidhyāyādū vyāpādanmithyādṛṣṭeḥ prativirato bhavati /
K10bsu034_u:6238: tasya sarvaṃ kāyavāṅbhanodauṣṭhulyaṃ prahīṇaṃ bhavatyucchinnamūlaṃ tālāmastakavadāyatyāmanutpādadharmi /
K10bsu034_u:6241: bhūtapūrvaṃ kumāra atīte 'dhvanyasaṃkhyeye kalpe asaṃkhyeyatare vipule apramāṇe acintye aparimāṇe yadāsīt /
K10bsu034_u:6242: tena kālena tena samayena jñānaprabhāso nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loka (Vaidya 280)
K10bsu034_u:6243: udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān /
K10bsu034_u:6244: tena khalu punaḥ kumāra kālena tena samayena tasya bhagavato jñānaprabhāsasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya ṣaṣṭivarṣakoṭyaḥ āyuṣpramāṇamabhūt
K10bsu034_u:6247: tena ca kumāra kālena tena samayena rājābhūdviśeṣacintī nāma /
K10bsu034_u:6248: atha khalu rājā viśeṣacintī aśītyā prāṇikoṭibhiḥ sārdhaṃ tathāgatamupasaṃkrāntaḥ/
K10bsu034_u:6249: upsaṃkramya tasya tathāgatasya pādau śirasābhivandya bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtyaikānte nyaṣīdat /
K10bsu034_u:6250: ekāntaniṣaṇṇaśca rājā viśeṣacintī taṃ tathāgataṃ paryupāste /
K10bsu034_u:6251: atha khalu kumāra jñānaprabhāsastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho rājño viśeṣacintinaḥ
K10bsu034_u:6255: emeva śuddho ayu kāyasaṃvaro na śakyu ghoṣeṇa kadāci deśitum // SRS_38.1 //
K10bsu034_u:6256: viviktu śūnyo ayu kāyasaṃvaro etādṛśe te ubhi kāyalakṣaṇe /
K10bsu034_u:6257: alakṣaṇāste yatha antarīkṣaṃ tallakṣaṇo deśitu kāyasaṃvaraḥ // SRS_38.2 //
K10bsu034_u:6258: yo jānatī saṃvaramevalakṣaṇaṃ na tasya jātu bhavatī nasaṃvaraḥ /
K10bsu034_u:6259: ye cāpravṛttāḥ kṛtu teṣa gocaro anāsravasyo upapatti nāsti // SRS_38.3 //
K10bsu034_u:6260: na śakyu kāmān pratisevamānai rūpeṣu bhogeṣu jahitva tṛṣṇām /
K10bsu034_u:6261: bhaveṣu doṣānavijānamānairna śakyu jñātumayu kāyasaṃvaraḥ // SRS_38.4 //
K10bsu034_u:6262: anāsravaṃ saṃvaru yaḥ prajānate na tasya bhotī upapatti jātu /
K10bsu034_u:6263: arhantadharmā ima evarūpāḥ na sukaraṃ jānitu tīrthikebhiḥ // SRS_38.5 //
K10bsu034_u:6265: ye sarvatraidhātuki trastamānasā na kāmabhogeṣu spṛhāṃ janenti /
K10bsu034_u:6266: rājyena bhogaiśca na jātu arthikā jñāsyanti te īdṛśa kāyasaṃvaraḥ // SRS_38.6 //
K10bsu034_u:6267: artho ayaṃ vuccati kāyasaṃvaro arthaśca śabdena na śakyu deśitum /
K10bsu034_u:6268: yo jānatī īdṛśu dharmanetrīṃ sa saṃvare 'smin bhavati pratiṣṭhitaḥ // SRS_38.7 //
K10bsu034_u:6269: arthe prayuktāna mayārthu deśito ye arthanetrīparatā vicakṣaṇāḥ /
K10bsu034_u:6270: anarthu varjenti ya arthayuktā te saṃvare 'smin satataṃ pratiṣṭhitāḥ // SRS_38.8 //
K10bsu034_u:6271: artho ya ukto hi jināna śāsane kathaṃ sa artho bhavatī vijānato /
K10bsu034_u:6272: yo arthanetrīya svabhāvu jānati pratiṣṭhitaḥ socyati kāyasaṃvare // SRS_38.9 //
K10bsu034_u:6273: yenānimittaṃ bhavatī vijānitaṃ nairātmyataḥ śūnyatu tucchato vā /
K10bsu034_u:6274: na tasya jātū bhavati nasaṃvarastathāhi so śikṣitu bhūtaniścaye // SRS_38.10 //
K10bsu034_u:6275: bhāvānabhāvāniti yaḥ prajānati sa sarvabhāveṣu na jātu sajjate /
K10bsu034_u:6279: na tasya jātu bhavatī asaṃvarastathāhi so śikṣitu bhūtaniścaye // SRS_38.12 //
K10bsu034_u:6280: yo jānatī śūnyata pañcaskandhān viditva nairātmasvabhāvaśūnyān /
K10bsu034_u:6282: na tasya jātu bhavatī asaṃvaro yat karma kāyena samācareta // SRS_38.13 //
K10bsu034_u:6283: nimittagrāhisya asaṃvṛtasya ya ātmasaṃjñāya sadā pratiṣṭhitaḥ /
K10bsu034_u:6284: rūpeṣu āsvādagatasya jantunaḥ prakupyate rāga asaṃvṛtasya // SRS_38.14 //
K10bsu034_u:6285: ye bhūtakoṭīya bhavanti śikṣitā gatiṃgatāḥ sūrata śūnyatāyām /
K10bsu034_u:6286: na teṣa rāgaḥ puna jātu kupyate asaṃvaro yena vrajeta durgatim // SRS_38.15 //
K10bsu034_u:6287: na śakyu kampetu yathā sumeru acāliyaḥ sarvapipīlikairmahān /
K10bsu034_u:6288: tathā vidū bhūtanayeṣu śikṣito rūpehi divyairapi so na kampate // SRS_38.16 //
K10bsu034_u:6289: śakyeta raṅgairgaganaṃ vicitrituṃ śakyeta cākāśa gṛhītu pāṇinā /
K10bsu034_u:6290: na tveva śakyaṃ sa vicālanāya rāgeṇa doṣeṇa na ca mārakoṭibhiḥ // SRS_38.17 //
K10bsu034_u:6291: pratiśrukā śakyu gṛhītu kenacicchilā plavedapyudakasya madhye /
K10bsu034_u:6292: draṣṭuṃ na śakyaṃ tviha tasya āśayā yaḥ śikṣito īdṛśi kāyasaṃvare // SRS_38.18 //
K10bsu034_u:6293: yāvanta śabdāḥ pṛthu sarvaloke gṛhṇitva peḍāgata śakya kartum /
K10bsu034_u:6294: na tasya śakyaṃ sthitirasthitirvā vijānituṃ yaḥ sthitu kāyasaṃvare // SRS_38.19 //
K10bsu034_u:6295: śakyaṃ prabhā gṛhṇitu sūryamaṇḍalāt pragarjato meghatu vidyuto vā /
K10bsu034_u:6296: na tasya kāyasya svabhāva jñātuṃ yaḥ śikṣitaḥ syādiha kāyasaṃvare // SRS_38.20 //
K10bsu034_u:6297: jālena pāśena ca śakyu bandhituṃ caturdiśaṃ vāyati vātamaṇḍalī /

K10bsu034_u:6537: yena manaḥsaṃvareṇa samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni pratilabhate /

K10bsu034_u:6545: yena manaḥsaṃvareṇaḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaścaturo brahmavihārān pratilabhate /
K10bsu034_u:6548: yena manaḥsaṃvareṇa samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaścatvāri smṛtyupasthānāni pratilabhate /
K10bsu034_u:6556: yena manaḥsaṃvareṇa samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahākaruṇāvihāraṃ pratilabhate /
K10bsu034_u:6560: hitaiṣitāṃ ca īryāṃ ca caryāṃ ca pratilabhate /
K10bsu034_u:6562: punaraparaṃ kumāra manaḥsaṃvara ucyate - yena manaḥsaṃvareṇa samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mithyādṛṣṭiprahāṇāya mithyādṛṣṭyā sārdhaṃ na saṃvasati /
K10bsu034_u:6571: ye cānye doṣopasaṃhitā manaḥsaṃkalpāstebhyaḥ sarvebhyaḥ prativirato bhavati /
K10bsu034_u:6582: tacca nopalabhate na kalpayati na manyate nāvalambate nābhiniviśate /
K10bsu034_u:6584: pariśuddhamanaḥsamudācāro hi kumāra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākṣaṇāṃśca varjayati /
K10bsu034_u:6586: sarvabuddhebhyaśca sarvabuddhābhijñāṃ akopyāṃ ca cetovimuktiṃ pratilabhate /
K10bsu034_u:6588: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
K10bsu034_u:6589: śṛṇotha sarvi avikṣiptamanā mama bhāṣato manaḥsaṃvaraṇam /
K10bsu034_u:6590: śrutvā ca tatra pratiapadyathā me yadīcchathā laghu viśodhanatām // SRS_38.72 //
K10bsu034_u:6591: manaḥsaṃvareṇa labhi yena vidu parama praśānta vipulānacalān /
K10bsu034_u:6592: jinadharmacintiya tathādbhutatāṃ manaḥsaṃvarucyati viśuddha ayam // SRS_38.73 //
K10bsu034_u:6593: manaḥsaṃvareṇa labhi yena vidu cetovimuktimacalāṃ satatam /
K10bsu034_u:6594: vajropamaṃ tatha samādhivaraṃ manaḥsaṃvarūcyati hi śreṣṭha ayam // SRS_38.74 //
K10bsu034_u:6595: niṣpādayatyapi ca yena vidu upacāraraśmiṃ vipulārthakarīm /
K10bsu034_u:6596: āryāṣṭāṅgupetaśvara yena labhī manaḥsaṃvarūcyati viśuddha ayam // SRS_38.75 //
K10bsu034_u:6597: manaḥsaṃvareṇa vidu yena varāṃ dvātriṃśalakṣaṇa laghū labhate /
K10bsu034_u:6598: yaśa co balānyakhilabuddhaguṇān manaḥsaṃvaraḥ kathitu śreṣṭha ayam // SRS_38.76 //
K10bsu034_u:6599: manasaṃvareṇa labhi yena vidu pratisaṃvidastatha viśāradatām /
K10bsu034_u:6600: paramādbhutān guṇa acintya tathā manaḥsaṃvaraḥ kathitu śreṣṭhu ayam // SRS_38.77 //
K10bsu034_u:6602: manaḥsaṃvareṇa labhi yena vidu smṛtyupasthāna catu ṛddhipādān /
K10bsu034_u:6603: samyakprahāṇa bala indriya co manaḥsaṃvara kathitu śreṣṭha ayam // SRS_38.78 //
K10bsu034_u:6604: manaḥsaṃvareṇa laghu yena vidu bodhyaṅga sapta labhate vimalān /
K10bsu034_u:6605: aṣṭāṅgikaṃ ca tatha mārgavaraṃ manaḥsaṃvaraḥ kathitu śreṣṭha ayam // SRS_38.79 //
K10bsu034_u:6606: manaḥsaṃvareṇa labhi yena vidu mahupekṣatāviharaṇaṃ pravaram /
K10bsu034_u:6607: karuṇāvihārimamalaṃ ca paraṃ manaḥsaṃvaraḥ kathitu śreṣṭha ayam // SRS_38.80 //
K10bsu034_u:6608: manaḥsaṃvareṇa labhi yena śivān kṣemān vitarka vidu śuddha sadā /
K10bsu034_u:6609: labhate guṇāḍhyu pravivekakathāṃ manaḥsaṃvaraḥ kathitu śreṣṭha ayam // SRS_38.81 //
K10bsu034_u:6610: manasaṃvareṇa vidu yena yuto mithyākudṛṣṭyā saha na vasati /
K10bsu034_u:6611: vyāpādābhidhyā na ca saṃjanayī manaḥsaṃvaraḥ kathitu śreṣṭha ayam // SRS_38.82 //
K10bsu034_u:6612: manaḥsaṃvareṇa vidu yena yutaḥ kuhanāṃ karoti na muhūrtamapi /
K10bsu034_u:6613: gurūṇāṃ ca śāṭhiyu na saṃjanayī manaḥsaṃvaraḥ kathitu śreṣṭha ayam // SRS_38.83 //
K10bsu034_u:6614: manaḥsaṃvareṇa vidu yena yuto rāgatha dveṣa na janeti manaḥ /
K10bsu034_u:6615: tatha mohacittu na janeti kvacit manaḥsaṃvaraḥ kathitu śreṣṭhu ayam // SRS_38.84 //
K10bsu034_u:6616: manaḥsaṃvareṇa vidu yena yuto bodhāya citta na viniḥsṛjatī /
K10bsu034_u:6617: adhyāśayaṃ ca na vikopayatī manaḥsaṃvaraḥ kathitu śreṣṭha ayam // SRS_38.85 //
K10bsu034_u:6619: manaḥsaṃvareṇa vidu yena yuto ye cānya doṣa vividhā manasaḥ /
K10bsu034_u:6620: sarvebhi sārdha na ca saṃvasatī manaḥsaṃvaraḥ kathitu śreṣṭhu ayam // SRS_38.86 //
K10bsu034_u:6621: māyopamaṃ ca mana otaratī supinopamaṃ tatha marīcisamam /
K10bsu034_u:6622: pratibhāsalakṣaṇamatho satataṃ manaḥsaṃvaraḥ kathitu śreṣṭhu ayam // SRS_38.87 //
K10bsu034_u:6623: supimopamaṃ ca sukhamotaratī tathanitya śūnyata aśāśvatataḥ /
K10bsu034_u:6624: mana eva otarati yena vidu manasaṃvaraḥ kathitu śreṣṭhu ayam // SRS_38.88 //
K10bsu034_u:6625: nirjīvamotarati niḥsattva mano utpannu pratyayata cakrasamam /
K10bsu034_u:6626: na kutaścidāgatu na cāpi gataṃ manasaṃvaraḥ kathitu śreṣṭha ayam // SRS_38.89 //
K10bsu034_u:6627: na ca tanmanye upalabhāti kvaci na ca kalpayatyatha na manyatyasau /
K10bsu034_u:6628: nālambhate viniviśati na co manasaṃvaraḥ kathitu śreṣṭhu ayam // SRS_38.90 //
K10bsu034_u:6630: mana evamotarati yena vidu manasaṃvaraḥ kathitu śreṣṭha ayam // SRS_38.91 //
K10bsu034_u:6635: yadidaṃ svapnopamaṃ tribhavaṃ dṛṣṭvā tatra virāgatāmutpādayati /
K10bsu034_u:6638: yadidaṃ māyopamatāṃ skandhadhātvāyatanānāṃ buddhā teṣāṃ vyavasargaḥ /
K10bsu034_u:6693: yadidaṃ gurūṇḥmantike bhayaṃ ca kalyḥṇamitratḥ ca //
K10bsu034_u:6741: yadidaṃ śrāvakapratyekabuddhapiṭakasya bodhisattvapiṭakasya ca ādhāraṇatā bhāvanatā ca //
K10bsu034_u:6801: yadidaṃ parato duruktānāṃ vacanapathānāmadhyupekṣā kṣāntyakhaṇḍanatā ca //
K10bsu034_u:6831: yadidaṃ dharmagatamanasikāratā yuktabhāṇitā kālajñatā yathābhūtānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ bhūtaprakāśanatā //
K10bsu034_u:6893: yadidaṃ pañcasvabhijñāsu sthitvā durvijñeyānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ parebhyaḥ saṃprakāśanatā //
K10bsu034_u:6943: yadidaṃ yathābhūtānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ prakāśanatā vyavasthāpanatā ca,
K10bsu034_u:6989: yadidaṃ bodhau tīvracchandatā ca pareṣāṃ samutsāhanatā ca //
K10bsu034_u:6993: yadidaṃ svapnopamānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ budhyanatā ca vastuvibhāvanatā
K10bsu034_u:6999: yadidaṃ yathābhūtānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ kuśalākuśalānāṃ upamāvadānaiḥ saṃprakāśanatā //
K10bsu034_u:7088: yadidaṃ devamānuṣikāyāḥ prajāyāḥ saṃpatterāhātitrakaṃ copādāya mokṣāhāritrakamupādāya //
K10bsu034_u:7128: yadidaṃ sarvākuśaladharmaprahāṇāya ca saṃvartate sarvakuśaladharmāhāraṇatāyai ca sarvasattvamokṣāharaṇatāyai saṃvartate //
K10bsu034_u:7219: ayaṃ sa ucyate kumāra sarvadharmasvabhāvasamatāvipañcito nāma samādhiḥ //
K10bsu034_u:7223: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
K10bsu034_u:7224: vipulā buddhadharmā hi vipulo deśito nayaḥ /
K10bsu034_u:7225: vipulaṃ dharma deśitvā vipulāṃllabhate guṇān // SRS_40.1 //
K10bsu034_u:7228: vipulā cari sattvānāṃ vipulā teṣu deśitā /
K10bsu034_u:7230: asmin khalu punaḥ sarvadharmasvabhāvasamatāvipañcitasamādhinirdeśe dharmaparyāye bhāṣyamāṇe aprameyaiḥ sattvairanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittānyutpāditāni,
K10bsu034_u:7234: ayaṃ ca trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātuḥ ṣaḍavikāraṃ kampitaḥ prakampitaḥ saṃprakampitaḥ /
K10bsu034_u:7252: sulabdhā lābhāsteṣāṃ sattvānāṃ ya imaṃ mahākaruṇāvatāradharmaparyāyaṃ śroṣyanti /
K10bsu034_u:7253: bahubuddhaparyupāsitāste sattvā bhaviṣyanti ya imaṃ sarvadharmasvabhāvasamatāvipañcitasamādhiṃ punaḥ punaḥ śroṣyanti,
K10bsu034_u:7254: śrutvā ca likhiṣyanti udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti araṇābhāvanayā bhāvayiṣyanti,
K10bsu034_u:7258: atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmantamānandamāmantrayate sma - udgṛhvīṣva tvamānanda imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dhāraya vācaya paryavāpnuhi,
K10bsu034_u:7260: atha khalvāyuṣmānānado bhagavantametadavocat - ko nāmāyaṃ bhagavan dharmaparyāyaḥ,
K10bsu034_u:7262: bhagavānāha - mahākaruṇāvatāro nāmānanda idaṃ sūtraṃ dhāraya /
K10bsu034_u:7264: ānanda āha - udgṛhīto me bhagavannayaṃ dharmaparyāya iti //
K10bsu034_u:7266: āttamanāścandraprabhaḥ kumārabhūta āyuṣmāṃścānandaḥ tāścatasraḥ parṣado bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikāḥ
K10bsu034_u:7267: aneke ca śuddhāvāsakāyikā devaputrāḥ sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaśca loko bhagavato
K10bsu034_u:7269: ityāryasarvadharmasvabhāvasamatāvipañcitāt samādheryathālabdhaṃ samādhirājaṃ nāma mahāyānasūtraṃ parivarto nāma catvāriṃśatitamaṃ samāptam //
K10bsu034_u:7270: ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetusteṣāṃ tathāgato hyavadat /
K10bsu034_u:7271: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodha evaṃ vādī mahāśramaṇaḥ //
